title: 15-year-old girl arrested, accused of fatally shooting boyfriend in Mobile
content:
A 16-year-old died after being shot in the face Saturday evening in Mobile.
Jermaine Wright was pronounced dead at around 6:30 p.m. in a residence in the 2100 block of Agate Avenue, according to police.
Police believe Wright's 15-year-old girlfriend accidentally shot him in the face while playing with a handgun. She was arrested and charged with manslaughter.
The 15-year-old is being held at Strickland Youth Center.
Anyone with information is asked to call Mobile Police at 251-208-7211, CrimeStoppers at 251-208-7000, or text Mobile Police Intel at CRIMES (274637) and include the keyword "CRIME411."
